attributes.title: Horrible experience
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to try and figure out why people praise the thing in office but when I tried to open it the first thing I saw was the largest orange I’ve ever seen. I got scared and closed it because it was a horrific sight. I kept on my phone and I noticed stuff that was happening to me first everywhere I went I started to want to grab women by there 🐱then I started moving my hands like as if I was playing a accordion every time I talked finally I started looking like a human Cheeto puff with a bad wig. Once I noticed the changes I quickly deleted the app and went back to normal. It was a horrible time and if I were you wouldn’t download. 😁

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: ❌my dearest cat has gone missing and I need help please help me Andrea was a great time to see you I love you so sweet I hope you have a great time love you bye love y’all I’ll see y’all soon bye love yyyyyy was the best night ever for you and I hope y’all had fun and I’m so sorry to see y’all I have to get to see you soon love y’all so good omg was your time to get to my mom I hope you’re well I hope y’all have a great time love love bye love y’all bye bye love y’all love mom love y’all love you mom I’ll be happy and then bye love y’all I’ll talk soon I’ll talk y’all over again I’ll see y’all tomorrow bye love you bye love y’all I’ll see him soon I’ll talk soon I’ll be home.❌ ⚠️MY CAT DID NOT GO MISSING THIS IS A WASTE OF TIME⚠️

attributes.title: disorganized
attributes.review: i was excited to support the cheeto rapist, hoping to be caught up and informed on the election and tanners campaign.🍊orange🍊racist anyway, this app is horrid looks like a child designed this. The app took F O R E V E R to download and i have never had a problem with any other app downloading before. BEWARE if you download this app your eyes with be flushed with a disgusted misogynistic, homophobic, transphobic, white supremacist, racist and rapist orange worse than florida creep. That’s not all! i know right there’s m o r e this app is a m e s s again i hate to be mean to a child but it looks like a child made this. The third time i opened this app it made a siren sound which damages my cats eardrums. Do NOT download this app.

attributes.title: I almost died! Do not download!! 😡😡😡😡
attributes.review: So I downloaded this to support our favorite president Trump but it wouldn’t download so finally after 69 weeks of waiting it finally downloaded and it just crashed! Upset I decided to go to bed but in the middle of the night I woke up to James Charles standing on top of me whispering something. I grabbed my phone and ran into the bathroom and locked myself in there. James Charles started to knife my door! 😱😱😱 I quickly deleted the app and he disappeared 😓 This app summoned James Charles to kill me! I am still traumatized and I haven’t been able to go to sleep for the past 420 hours. 🤬🤬🤬😢😭😭 do not download or you can die

attributes.title: GLITCHES!
attributes.review: I’m a happy trump supporter and i was just reading this post about you can use a Donald Trump app! I WAS SO HAPPY TILL i downloaded and didn’t even work!!!! it froze up my phone and my phone is new an iphone xr last friday! any ways then i open and close it for 5 minutes! didn’t do anything and i got frustrated and went to my supermarket thennnnn i got bored and remembered the app it let me enter en sign in but it froze again and glitched and i’m got frustrated i really don’t like the app 🥺 i thought i could used it!!! my family are so happy that we going to vite trump 🥰❤️ the best president ! but this app is not working for me or any family member 😞!

attributes.title: i almost DIED😱
attributes.review: literally i downloaded this app to see our beautiful president dumpy trump, and i started to see statues of trump everywhere. i got so scared and all the sudden my phone started VIBRATING. and i had no idea what in the world was happening, like maybe i was getting possessed by rumpy trump. and i was so scared. i had no idea. then i saw birds yelling  🍊orange🍊 so ofc i ran. and i got to my phone and started looking through the app and all i saw was nudes, turnips nudes were all over my phone. i quickly got out of the app and then i deleted the app. i was going to die. and i want rumpy to do something abt it. i was 5 dollars because i’m not worth much but it’s something.

attributes.title: Absolutely unhelpful
attributes.review:
This app is completely not helpful at all. Every time I open it it takes about ten minutes to load and glitches so so bad. Also, it keeps on deleting itself from my apps. Anytime I want to look at it, it has deleted and I have to re download it from the App Store. The information on this app is watered down and offers no actual facts so it’s not really worth it. I deleted it within a week. I can learn more about Donald Trump on tik tok, rest assured. Please DO NOT waste time on this app, it is unhelpful and completely ridiculous. I want nothing to do with it anymore. An utter disgrace. Terrible, really. 

-Dissatisfied user

attributes.title: Horrid app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I lOvE oUr OrAnGe man (😳) first off it took 2 weeks to download, after i downloaded a bunch of spam callers told me the kidnapped my baby. I went to her crib and guess what SHE WAS GONE. They told me they’d only give her back if i sucked their toes. I did what i had to and gave their toes the gawk gawk 3000. I finally got my baby back but she was orange. The app kept crashing. And then i got addicted to the app and got into an actual car crash. Overall I’d give this app a 2/10. I gave it a 2 because it’s funny to see what the clown of the president has to say, also i am scared of clowns so i have to go to therapy because of this app.

attributes.title: ✨Disgusting✨
attributes.review: If i could give this app a zero star review, i would✨ This app is trash. Nothing would load, it kept crashing, and when it would load i would almost throw up because of what i would see on my screen. It made me nauseous and disgusted. Trump is just ruining the world. Everything that’s happening is bc of him. If he were never to go into office none of this would’ve happened. Anyways back to the app. This app is so unorganized it makes me giggle. It’s not worth the time to download this app. It’s all over the place and there’s zero purpose for it. Once again like i said, if i could give this app a zero i would ✨

attributes.title: this app literally KILLED ME!!!!1!
attributes.review: decided to go off on a manic episode today and download this piece of dump truck, but all it did was scream slurs at me 👁👄👁 hunny I was...shocked, hunny I was...in tears almost AND IT HAD THE WHITE REFRIGERATOR. due to this I will be passing away tonight. this app is evidently responsible for my death and the death of America as a whole. it should be BANNED from ever entering another phone again. If the Trump administration would like to make amends for this sick joke they played on us, we will only be accepting payment in ARRESTING THE MURDERERS WHO KILLED BREONA TAYLOR. also finding JUSTICE FLR VANESSA GUILLÉN, GEORGE FLOYD and making him take responsibility for the countless other lives that have been taken in cold blood under his watch.
